latest_updates.text:
We are overjoyed to announce that we have exceeded 200% of our funding goal in under 7 hours of being live on Indiegogo! 

 

We launched this morning thinking we would be thrilled if we met our goal by the end of the week, so to double it in just a few hours means the world to us. 

We are incredibly grateful to everyone who has backed us so far. We are beyond fortunate to have you guys as our first community members, and can't wait for the exciting journey ahead!

Let's go Otari Fam!!

response.title: GoGoLeash: All-in-One Dog Leash and Collar System
response.tagline: The World's Most Advanced Dog-Walking And Training Tool For Your Good Boy or Girl.

latest_updates.text:
Hey guys,

We didn’t expect to get such great support in just ONE hour! THANK YOU EVERYONE!!! We hope GoGoLeash can become a new standard of dog leashes and bring convenience to all the dog lovers. 

Many backers have voiced can't wait to get GoGoLeash quickly. We hear you and are working on it. Now we decided to offer one FREE early GoGoLeash to one of our backers to test our prototype and film a review! 

To be entered into the prototype review giveaway, you must have backed our Indiegogo campaign, LEAVE A COMMENT IN THE INDIEGOGO comment section, and share the Indiegogo link on Instagram or Facebook with the tag #gogoleash. We will pick the winner next Friday, June 5.

And...if you like our project you can share our launch page to your friends, we will be very grateful! 

 

GoGoLeash Team

response.tagline: High-Definition | Accurate | Magnetic | Silica Gel | Easy Use

latest_updates.text:
Dear backers,

Thanks for all of your love and support. We hit the $400k+ milestone because of you! There are only 2 days left 'till the end of our campaign so be sure to share it with your family and friends before the deal is gone.

| Statement on Resellers |

We've been informed by many backers on seeing unauthorized resellers selling Bebird X17 pro through third-party websites and from paid ads on Facebook and Instagram. We want to remind you that Indiegogo is the ONE & ONLY platform for Bebird X17 pro purchase. We have absolutely no affiliation with these unauthorized resellers so please be careful of any fraud and make sure to purchase only through Indiegogo.

For any other questions you may have, leave us a comment or email us at crowdfunding@blackbees.cn and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Thanks again for all of your great support! Stay tuned for more product images/videos coming in the next few days ;)

Love,

The Bebird Team

Dear Sinaaudio T20 Backers,

Over 235% FULLY FUNDED! Thank you so much for the great support to make it happen! Let’s keep it up and share Sinaaudio T20 with your friends!

We’re so excited to send out 3 pairs of Sinaaudio T20. Share with your friends or families who will be interested in Sinaaudio T20!

response.title: NexFan Ultra: Portable AC with Powerful Cooling
response.tagline: World’s Best Air Cooler with Powerful Cooling and High Energy Efficiency

latest_updates.text:
Dear friends and backers,

 

Shipping Updates

As indicated in the picture below, we have sent out the first few batches of units from the factory, and it takes approximately 20 days for the units to reach the local ports of the distributed countries. As a result of the COVID-19 repercussion as well as rounds of verification complications at the custom, the estimated time of arrival would experience some delays despite our expectations and wishes. In regards to the issue that many of you who have placed the orders are facing, we are truly sorry for the inconvenience and are grateful for your patience, and we will definitely try our best to upload the tracking details as long as we get the feedback from the shipping ports. Please stay tuned. 

Tracking status will be available on the “Contribution Details” page after our confirmation. We will also make sure to update the shipping date for the next batch of units, and the following disclosure photos reflect the shipping statuses of the remaining batches. For any further questions regarding shipping and delivery, please contact us at global@nexfan.net. We will come back to you as soon as possible.

There are only 4 days left until our campaign comes to a landing! We have successfully reached over $950,000 so far and we are certain that we couldn't make it without your love and support! 

Please also help us share this product with your family and friends:

With love,

NexFan Team

response.title: Amazfit X Curved Smartwatch: Bow to the Future
response.tagline: Curved screen smartwatch with 24/7 heart tracking

latest_updates.text:
Dear friends and backers, 

 

We are amazed by the pool of customers’ feedback, with the majority pointing at the watch band replacement. We have heard you and thus developed a solution:

 

Watch Bands Package Available

We would offer a separate package of black watch bands consisting of one buckle-side band and two point-side bands (one ranges from 145mm~180mm and the other ranges from 162mm~205mm). We are still confirming the details of the gold watch bands and will let you know as soon as possible. As the watch bands are made of fluororubber, the material texture is soft and skin-friendly, which would be the best gear for sports as well as the most simplistic presentation according to most users’ profiles. The package is worth $25 at retail price but is sold at $19 with a 24% discount at this stage of crowdfunding. The replacement of the buckle side has to be unscrewed delicately with a screwdriver as this is where the integrated antenna is located, whereas that of the point side can be done by simply clicking the detach button. 

For more details, please refer to the demo video from our last update: 

https://youtu.be/vVpZOMhrSec

 

Please kindly note that this package can be purchased only along with the watch unit(s). Simply click the add-on option when you place the order. However, if you have already bought the device, you can also place a separate order for this package on our campaign page, and we will make sure to ship them together with your watch unit. The shipping date of the black watch band will align with that of your watch unit(s).

 

Help us share!

Please also help us share this exciting news on Facebook and Twitter:

 

 

If you encounter any questions, please don’t hesitate to email us at global@huami.com, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Sincerely,

Huami Amazfit Team

response.title: The Babymaker - Stealth Road eBike With Belt Drive
response.tagline: Leave boring behind. Classic look with modern Ebike tech. Turn heads and crush any hill in style.

latest_updates.text:
This Just In

A large part of production consists of ordering all the parts required to make every bike. In the bike industry - you don't just go to some warehouse and pick your parts off the shelf. They're built to order.

Manufacturers like us place orders with suppliers - the suppliers then use those funds to build the components. It's almost exaclty how you place your order with us and we use the funds to build your bike.

While waiting for the longer lead time components (motor, brakes, belt, battery) we work on the frames (as you've seen in previous updates).

During this process, the components begin rolling in. Once they're finally complete - we assemble the bikes!  Today we received shipment of a very important component:

 

What a beautiful sight...

 

 

These pallets are full of Magura Hydraulic Disc brake sets for the Babymake PRO with upper bars.  We're one step closer to full assembly. 

 

 

Stay tuned for more production updates...

 

We Love You

Rob, Pete and Team FLX

 

 

PS:

If you missed the touring package and other accessories at checkout, you can watch this video about how to order them below.

Note: This will not work with google pay or apple pay.

 

 

Click This Link To Choose Your Accessories

latest_updates.text:
We are currently taking all orders for July/August (depending on model). You can see your expected delivery time by checking your order summary. We really appreciate your patience with this.

We also want to confirm that all current orders and future orders come with the NFC disc as standard (this has been the case since February) so you won't need to order the disc separately. 

Thank you for your support during this difficult time and hope you are all safe and healthy.

latest_updates.text:
7 DAYS, 1400% FUNDED!

Hey guys!

This first week since the launch of TAU has been incredible, it's already more than 1400% funded! Thousands of backers loved the concept and decided to contribute in just a few days.

We can't thank you enough for this, and we are really happy to see all the positive feedback about TAU. 

Most Super Early Bird and Rolling Square family perks have been claimed, BUT:

we have received some messages of backers that couldn't get any Rolling Square family perks on time, as they didn't see our previous update, so we added a few more units of the 2 + 2 SECRET PERK:

2 TAU + 2 Docks | Rolling Square Family

 

Be fast, there are only a few units available!

 

To see how TAU can solve your device's battery problems, check out the video here:

We can't wait to see where this new adventure will take us!

 

With love,

 

The Rolling Square Team

 

For any questions please contact us at support@rollingsqua.re, we receive a lot of emails but will reply within 48 hours!

response.title: GPD WIN Max: Handheld Game Console for AAA Games
response.tagline: Pro processor. Pro gamepad. Pro performance. The ultimate handheld game console. Intel & Win10 OS

latest_updates.text:
In order to avoid fan noise, the Capital indicator of WIN Max

is now changed to the fan silent mode indicator,

and a fan logo is printed on the F key of the keyboard

Turn on silent mode: Fn + F key After turning on,

the fan turns off and the white light flashes

flashing period 1s,on 0.5s,off 0.5s

After being turned on,the temperature below 50℃，

fan 1 remains 30% rotate speed.When above 50℃,

dual-fan keep the 30% rotate speed.

The white light goes off after entering S3(STR:Suspend to RAM),

and S3(STR:Suspend to RAM) comes back to

maintain the state before entering S3(STR:Suspend to RAM)

PS:the status prompt of the Caps look key is

supported by the system optimization software which developed by GPD.

response.title: Fat Iron: Iron off stubborn fat & stretch marks
response.tagline: World's 1st FDA cleared & clinically tested home use device that TRULY IRONS OFF FAT!

latest_updates.text:
Hey backers! 

 

We just passed the $500,000… Thanks to every one of you for your incredible support!

 

To celebrate this milestone in our campaign and to show you some gratitude for being awesome, we are having an incredible 72 hours offer: 

Microderm Cleansing Set

including: 

powerful Microdermabrasion system with 4 heads 

Macchiato Thermal Face Mask

Anti-aging Crush Face Scrub

 

for ONLY $99 (retail price of $260)!!!! 

 

 

This offer is a 72 hours secret perk only visible to our backers through the link below. This offer will last only 72 hours so don’t waste any time and get it now! It’s time to care for that beautiful face of yours! 

 

Get your secret perk HERE 

 

Microderm Device

Microdermabrasion is a technique that uses suction and exfoliation to remove the top layer of skin. It reveals smoother and younger-looking skin and stimulates new cell growth. Weekly treatments will decrease the appearance of blackheads, pores, blemishes, hyperpigmentation, fine lines, and wrinkles. With just one use, you will see instant results to reveal fresh, healthy skin with a brighter complexion!

 

BENEFITS:

Exfoliates and treats outermost layers of dead, dull skin

Uses microdermabrasion technique for skin treatment

Removes the top layer of skin to reveal smoother, younger-looking skin

At-home use provides the same results as a professional spa or procedure

Microderm Device Skin Treatment Options

 

 

Anti-aging Crush Face Scrub

 

This unique formula is a proven anti-aging breakthrough to protect your skin and reverse the damage of age and the elements. The key is our exclusive Coffee Arabica formula, proven to restore a youthful appearance by protecting your skin’s own stem cells and encouraging them to renew skin texture. The formula is combined with Allantoin to deeply hydrate by binding moisture to dry skin. The Coffee Crush Face Scrub cleansing cream has an anti-bacterial agent that remains on the skin for prolonged periods of time and continues working to fight microbial damage. Jojoba, which soothes and calms skin while restoring vitality to delicate areas of the face. Ideal for daily use, this gentle scrub removes any remaining traces of makeup and oils while purifying your skin, restoring its pH level, and revealing a new surface that welcomes makeup or moisturizer.                      

 

Get your secret perk HERE 

 

Macchiato Thermal Face Mask

 

 

Treat your skin to the most advanced anti-aging science available today with Coffee Arabica Superior Facial Thermal Mask from COFFEE EVOLUTION. This unique self-heating mask not only smooths deep lines and wrinkles but also encourages your skin to renew itself. As it gently warms to the touch, the mask prepares your skin to absorb our highest concentration of breakthrough anti-aging Plant Stem Cell formula.

We enrich this anti-aging nutrient with extracts of chamomile, Camellia Sinensis, Coffee Arabica and other all-natural ingredients to promote smooth skin texture. Vitamin c revives skin’s appearance, leaving it fresh, clean, and vibrant while promoting youthful elasticity. All combined, it gives you phenomenal anti-aging action that helps reduce the look of wrinkles in moments while encouraging your skin to respond naturally by amplifying collagen levels that help restore youthful tone.                                                                          

 

Get your secret perk HERE 

 

Summer is coming, it’s time to get perfect skin! 

 

Best, 

The Fat Iron team

We enrich this anti-aging nutrient with extracts of chamomile, Camellia Sinensis, Coffee Arabica and other all-natural ingredients to promote smooth skin texture. Vitamin c revives skin’s appearance, leaving it fresh, clean, and vibrant while promoting youthful elasticity. All combined, it gives you phenomenal anti-aging action that helps reduce the look of wrinkles in moments while encouraging your skin to respond naturally by amplifying collagen levels that help restore youthful tone.                                                                          

 

Get your secret perk HERE 

 

Summer is coming, it’s time to get perfect skin! 

 

Best, 

The Fat Iron team

latest_updates.text:
Hi Backers,

Our first batch of Flash rewards have been shipped! Backers that fall in this category are our April backers who chose to only receive Flash 1.0. You will find that your tracking details have been emailed to you as well as uploaded to Backerkit. There was a lot of stress, anxiety and hard work on our end (given everything going on) and we’re ecstatic we have been able to make it work and stick to our scheduled timeline. We look forward to hearing your feedback and seeing pictures of Flash in action :)

Sharing our Flash packaging which we think is pretty kickass. Love it? Let us know in the comments.

For our remaining backers, we hope you feel reassured regarding the timeline of this campaign and know that we’re working tirelessly to ensure you receive your rewards soon as well. For remaining backers, we are still on schedule to begin shipping before the end of May. To make last minute changes to your survey, you can access it here: https://flash-powerbank.backerkit.com

Thank you for your support!

Chargeasap Team

response.title: Ninebot KickScooter ES2 - White: Make it Fashion
response.tagline: Limited Quantity | One-Step Folding System | Lightweight & Portable |  Best Scooter for Commuting

latest_updates.text:
Dear Segway Family,         

 

There are about 48 Hours Left till the ES2- White campaign ends, and there is still time to enjoy the Super Early Bird Perks. You can get up to $230 off so order now and you will still be able to enjoy the exclusive pricing.

 

A friendly reminder, the ES2 - White campaign is ending on May 28th, at 11:59 pm PT.

 

Shipment Status

 

 

We have some good news for you! Some of our backers had already received their Ninebot KickScooter ES2 – White this week, and we are expecting more scooters to be delivered very soon.

 

For backers who haven't received their scooters yet in the First Batch Shipment (contribution #1-152), please continue to monitor your shipping status regularly. To track your shipment status, enter your email address associated with the Ninebot KickScooter ES2 – White Indiegogo pre-order at http://ap.segway.com/mailcheck/

 

*Please note: Contribution No. 153 and up will be shipped shortly after the first batch shipment. 

 

We will post updates on the shipping status once we have more information. Until then, if you have any questions, please leave a comment, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

 

Stay tuned! 

 

Team Segway-Ninebot

response.title: The Elevated Craft Cocktail Shaker
response.tagline: Innovative tool for every home bar. Vacuum insulated with a patented measuring system and more.

latest_updates.text:
Greetings Elevated Fam,

 

This is just a quick update to keep you in the loop. Everything is chugging along with no major surprises since the last update. Last week the factory received the raw materials to start making the various components in the shaker assembly, which officially starts the 60-90 day lead time I referenced in the last update. This puts the delivery window around the end of July +/- a few weeks depending on how efficient shipping companies are operating. If any opportunities arise to speed up production without sacrificing quality, we will make it happen.

 

The positive messages we receive on a daily basis are very encouraging and serve as a reminder for why the crowdfunding community is so amazing! I’ve been working on this product for around two years now and this is the final stretch, which is very exciting! I am so thankful for your continued enthusiasm about the shaker, your support and patience. 

 

Update on Improved Packaging

 

While we were waiting for the factory to receive raw materials, I made some improvements to the shaker packaging to make it recyclable. The original box had magnets embedded in the door, but I realized that the magnets make the box very hard to recycle. I like the function of the magnets but as a designer, I have a responsibility to make sustainable decisions and thus, a design change was needed. Rest assured the packaging is still very nice and giftable, it just has a different type of closure system. I have a call with the factory on Tuesday to review the packaging specifications and then they will begin making samples. When I receive the samples in the next few weeks, I will post an update to show you what you can expect. 

 

Community Input

 

As we get closer to the finish line, I’m getting more and more excited about expanding the Elevated Craft product line. My goal is to design products that empower you to create unforgettable experiences. Please let me know in the comments what products you’d like to see Elevated Craft launch in the future. 

 

Cheers, 

 

Adam Craft 

 

P.S. I’ve been trying to grow mint for my cocktails and the Pico Garden looks like it would be a huge help, check it out! 

 

PICO: A garden in your palm. Growing is fun again!

 

Whether you have always dreamed of having fresh basil in your kitchen or wanted to grow jasmine at your desk — Pico is there to do all the hard work for you.

 

Don't worry about underwatering or overwatering. Don't worry about them not getting enough sunlight or being too exposed. Be it edibles, succulents or ornamentals, Pico knows what your plants need.

 

Get yours here!

response.title: STRØM CITY W - Design & Affordability - All In One
response.tagline: Priced from €979. The ultimate CITY e-Bike from the bicycle capital of the world, Denmark. Save 51%!

latest_updates.text:
Dear backers,

 

Welcome, all new ones - we are thankful to have you on board! 

 

Expansion of the STRØM team

 

We have exciting news to share with you. This week we welcomed two new guys, Anders and Trond, to the team. Both come with technical backgrounds and will make sure that our future set up for customer support will become top-notch. We have a lot of ideas for remote and online support for the maintenance of the bikes, which will be really exciting to show you all down the line. 

14 days left of the campaign x possible milestone upgrades

 

The campaign is still going strong and with only two weeks left it’s about time to tell friends, family and colleagues about the new beautiful eBike that they are potentially missing out on.

 

We are soon reaching 1 MIO USD! At this huge milestone, we want to reward all of you with some new upgrades for all your bikes. 1 - Upgrade of the bottom bracket to 4 internal bearings for an even smoother spinning experience. 2 - Upgrade on the PAS (Pedal Assist Sensor) for a more balanced and responsive ride. This will bring our bikes quicker out of the gate with a 2-pole system instead of the current 3 (Sorry for the technical explanation). It will anyhow enhance the riding experience even further than what we thought possible.

 

3 - STRØM key hanger designed with our logo built with the same air-craft graded 6161 aluminum as our frames are built with.   

Thanks for your continuous support - we couldn’t make it without you!

 

Best regards,

Team STRØM Bikes

response.title: nect MODEM: fast & secure LTE connection anywhere
response.tagline: portable modem with a global, high-quality 4G LTE connection, all-day battery, & no contracts.

latest_updates.text:
Hello friends! 

We’ve had some great pieces hit the digital presses since we launched - including features from the likes of Popcorn Gadget, ZDnet, MUSE, Geeky Gadgets and more! We couldn't be more grateful for all of the outreach you've done by spreading the news about nect MODEM to your friends and family. 

 Here’s a taste of what press and early testers are saying about nect MODEM:

Over 300% funded and counting...

The rumors are true! We’re well over 300% funded out of our goal of $30,000. Over 1000 of you have added your pre-orders to the list. Our deepest thanks to all of you who have purchased and shared. You’re making it possible for the world to have a better internet option. 

Just 1 minute needed

Every time you share nect MODEM, you’re helping your friends and family stay connected. If you haven’t already, join our Kickbooster program so you can get 11% cash back on every successful referral you make during the campaign:

REFER TO EARN 11% BACK 

Thank you, as always, for your support and your feedback - we couldn’t have come this far without you. With your enthusiasm, feedback, and continued support, we look forward to helping you work on the go and stay connected to your family and loved ones.

With gratitude,The nect MODEM Team

response.title: SuperCalla - Charging & Data Cables Redesigned
response.tagline: Form, function and irresistible fidgeting all in a one-of-a-kind magnetic charging / data cable!

latest_updates.text:
Hi Everyone!  We just wanted to post this update to introduce our team to the Indiegogo community!  We are really excited to work with all of you and have you onboard for the ride. We just want to let you know we are here for you! We are very active during our campaigns and keep up with questions and comments to the absolute best of our ability.  We even have a support email: support@supercallatech.com Please feel free to reach out anytime.

 

We are currently working day and night continuously on all aspects of our project. We have gotten our prototypes from our manufacturer, and are working with our team in all areas to keep things running smoothly, especially production wise. We will continue to update you guys as we get more information, any detail big or small! Please note that you will be able to mix and match, make all of your connection type selections, color, length selections, and input and get your calculated shipping info after the campaign ends, during a survey we will send out once our campaign ends. 

Thank you!
